Nice!

My one regret was that you didn't leave the engines on, even just a little bit, while the rocket was falling. The real one had them on, they just didn't produce enough thrust.

Actually the engines were the things that blow up, so there wasnt a real way to turn them on again if they werent there anymore lol

lmao, well thanks

the antares didn't actually explode from malfunction, it was self destructed once they realized it wasn't firing correctly. it would have probably eventually exploded or crashed into something though.

there's a c4 mod that allows you to detonate parts, that would have made the explosion more realistic. or you could just do a quick config change to mod the engines to explode from overheating at full thrust.

then why did only the bottom of the rocket explode initially?

One of the engines blew up and the other was inmediatly shut down, they detonated the rocket too late
